info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:29PM CDT until June 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CAVALIER...NORTHWESTERN WALSH AND SOUTHWESTERN PEMBINA COUNTIES... At 229 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Adams, or 26 miles west of Grafton, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Adams, Mountain, Milton, Fairdale, Gardar and Union. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
